description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Chiang Mai, Thailand. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Chiang Mai Five-Star Elegance with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
hotels.description: Set close to the tranquil banks of the Ping River, this five-star sanctuary offers a gateway to the heart of Chiang Mai. After days exploring mountain trails, ancient temples and vibrant markets, elevate your evening with a visit to Mai The Sky Bar, where you can savour the cityscape at the highest rooftop bar in the city. One child (11 and under) stays free, so the little ones can run wild at the Kids' Club, while adults relax by the sparkling pool in a private cabana or at YHI Spa. Outside the hotel, a short walk takes you to Chiang Mai Night Bazaar, while Tha Pae Gate and Chedi Luang Temple are minutes away.

hotels.title: Tranquil Five-Star Riverside Escape in the Heart of Chiang Mai
hotels.description: Escape to riverside tranquillity at Anantara Chiang Mai Resort, a slice of serenity on the banks of the Mae Ping River. Located on the grounds of the former British consulate, this luxurious resort combines modern luxury with traditional Thai touches and the site’s colonial-era heritage, all encompassed in a sleek, peaceful design. Be pampered at the spa, indulge in contemporary cuisine and enjoy ancient monuments, galleries and night markets all within walking distance.

hotels.title: Five-Star Shangri-La Escape in the Heart of Chiang Mai
hotels.description: Discover the tranquil mountain ranges of Northern Thailand with a stay at the five-star Shangri-La Chiang Mai, ranked in the top 10% of hotels worldwide by Tripadvisor. This indulgent sanctuary has been designed with inspiration from traditional Thai architecture and features opulent dark wood and gold painted Buddhist-influenced interiors. Take a dip in the free-form swimming pool, then take the kids over to the splash zone to slip down the waterslide. There are also tennis courts, a fully-equipped fitness centre with classes, and the tranquil Chi, The Spa where you can be pampered into pure bliss. Spend days exploring this incredible ancient city starting with a rickshaw ride down the narrow lanes in the Old Town, then return to the hotel and head to the onsite Kad Kafé where you can savour Thai, Chinese, Japanese, European and Mediterranean specialties.

hotels.title: Central Chiang Mai Hotel with Seven Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Experience the cultural charm of Thailand with a stay in the heart of Chiang Mai's bustling Old City. Step out to explore the ancient temples, bustling markets and vibrant nightlife of this captivating city, or stay in to savour authentic Thai cuisine at the hotel's seven dining outlets and bars. For a refreshing break, take a dip in the shimmering rooftop pool, offering panoramic views of the city and surrounding mountains, or indulge in the hotel's famous chocolate hour. No matter your preference, you'll be right at the heart of the Chiang Mai action.

hotels.title: Chiang Mai City Centre Stay near Night Bazaar with Onsite Dining, Spa & Pool
hotels.description: Discover comfort and convenience at a perfectly located gem in the heart of Thailand’s cultural capital, just 10 minutes from the airport. A short tuk-tuk ride will take you to the ancient city walls and moat, where you can explore the historic city, home to hundreds of ornate Buddhist temples. Wander to Chiang Mai’s famed Night Bazaar, just a 15-minute stroll away, or head to a nearby elephant sanctuary to get up close to these gentle giants. Back at the hotel, an indulgent spa awaits to restore your mind, body and soul.

hotels.title: Luxury Five-Star Escape in the Heart of Chiang Mai
hotels.description: Accept an invitation to explore the old-world charm, sprawling luxury and cosmopolitan sophistication, at InterContinental Chiang Mai Mae Ping, an IHG Hotel. Immerse yourself in Lanna culture in this 'living museum' concept hotel that blends the handiwork of local artisans with signature InterContiental opulence. Centrally located within the bustling heart of the city, this hotel is perfectly placed for rickshaw rides through the Old Town and exploring the numerous Thai Buddhist temples.
